attributes.action: Give Brendan Sheerin from Coach Trip a knighthood
attributes.background: For years, Brendan from Coach Trip has been representing the British people abroad in the best possible light. Cracking innuendos whilst ice skating or telling jokes on the beach, his British charm never fails to shine through. All this whilst protecting our tourists. Give him what he deserves.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
